abstract: Russell Banks based his new novel, Lost Memory of Skin, on a group of homeless sex offenders who sought refuge under a highway in Florida.

lead_paragraph: Russell Banks based his new novel, “Lost Memory of Skin,” on a group of homeless sex offenders who sought refuge under a highway in Florida.

headline.main: A Novelist Bypasses the Middle to Seek Out the Margins
